subtitle: Keltner Channels — ATR‑based envelope around EMA.

measures.how_to_read: Touches outside channels imply strong moves; width reflects volatility.
measures.caveats: Parameters affect sensitivity; compare to Bollinger for differences.
measures.what_it_measures: EMA-based channel using ATR as band width.

assistant_hints: ATR-based bands are smoother than Bollinger in trends.
Fade in ranges; use breaks/pullbacks in trends.
Tune multiplier/window to timeframe and volatility.
Combine with EMA/MACD to avoid fading strong moves.
